objects.name: StoryText
objects.string: Hey! I'm the Pixie Fae and I need your help!

content.text: Hey! I'm the Pixie Fae and I need your help!

parameters: "Children have been unable to sleep! Because..."
"We have to get the dreams back to the kids, or they'll be insomniacs for life!"
"Well... comeback when you can help me, you little *****!"
